slides.title: When you pre-screened Ms. Jones’ documents, you determined that she didn’t have all of the documentation required to proceed with the activity.
Even though Ms. Jones is unhappy that you can’t accept the photocopy of the MCO …
The fact that you pre-screened the documents is going to save both you and Ms. Jones a lot of time!
Because you didn’t start an activity in Tapestry first, and then discover the missing documentation later!

Notice of Additional Requirements Letter

You’re going to generate a Notice of Additional Requirements letter from Tapestry.
Start a new transaction in Tapestry so the Notice of Additional Requirements letter can be generated for the customer.

90 DAYS

This activity can be saved in Tapestry for 90 days.
The letter lists the required documents or missing information the customer will need to gather and bring back to the office to complete their request.

10 Days

The customer will have 10 days to return to the office with the required documents or information.

Go to the head of the line!

The customer will not have to wait in line again when they return to the office.
And that should help save them some valuable time!
Which is an important part of our mission!
